text: Uye vagari vemuParadhiso vachashevedzera kune vagari vemumoto (vachiti): “Tave tinowana zviri chokwadi izvo Tenzi vedu zvavakativimbisa; mave munowana zviri chokwadi here izvo Tenzi venyu zvavakakuvimbisai?” Vachati (vagari vemumoto): “Hongu.” Nokudaro mushevedzeri pakati pavo achashevedzera: “Kurengera kwaAllah kuri pane vatadzi.”
